content.text: Hi Mark, I'm Jen! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay at home parent, my wife is a teacher.
That's great, what's your favorite thing about being a stay at home parent?
I love being able to spend time with my kids and help them grow and learn.
That's awesome! I'm looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll do great things.
I'm afraid of being in a situation where I can't communicate with my wife.
That's understandable. I'm afraid that my boyfriend will leave me for someone else.
I'm sure he won't leave you, you sound like a great person.
Thanks, I appreciate that! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family, going for walks in nature, and reading books.
That sounds great! I love to read too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird.
That's a great book! I love Harper Lee's writing style.
